prompt: Design a forgot password screen with a soft pastel theme and a light pink background (Colors.pink[50]). Use a Column layout with crossAxisAlignment.center and a max width of 380. Display a 'Forgot Password?' title in deep pink (Colors.pink[800]), font size 28, and bold. Add a subtitle in gray (Colors.grey[600]) saying 'We’ll send a reset link to your email.' Include a TextField with a pastel pink border (Colors.pink[200]), hint text 'Enter your email', and a prefix icon (Icons.email) in pink. Add a full-width ElevatedButton with a pastel pink background (Colors.pink[300]), white text 'Send Link', and rounded corners (borderRadius: 10.0). Below, place a TextButton with 'Back to Login' in pink. Use padding of 26.0 and space elements with SizedBox(height: 20.0).
